channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Grass verge just a rutted mud patch, 10th February
item.description:
Delivery drivers have destroyed the grass verge. A tree or a post would prevent this and allow grass to grow.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 83, Kenilworth Crescent, Southbury, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More examples of grass verge destroyed by delivery vans, 10th February
item.description:
Grass verge needs trees or posts to protect it from vans bumping up onto it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 83, Kenilworth Crescent, Southbury, Greater London

item.title: Ongoing fly tipping 71A Plumstead Common Road, 10th February
item.description:
The residents of this address (entrance located on Bloomfield Road outside bus stop WD) continue to dump bags of domestic rubbish on the pavement next to the entrance to their upstairs flat - they don’t have space for their own bins. This has been going on since autumn and has to stop.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Footpath Side Of 72 Plumstead Common Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
At the end of clissold road some residents behind the Albion parade shops regularly/daily leave their rubbish and old furniture by the tree buy the mosque. Often overflowing and spread of food and waste on the pavement. Can you plese provide them with a bi
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clissold Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Lady Somerset Road Leading to Burghley Road, 10th February
item.description:
The pavement is york stone and there is moss along the whole of the road, which when it rains becomes even more slippery and hazardous. The resident has mobility issues and is in danger of falling and injuring herself further. and has requested that this issue be addressed as a matter of urgency.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17A, Lady Somerset Road, Tufnell Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drainage works and surrounding areas, 10th February
item.description:
Hi, we have Road works going on on the street but walkways around it very dirty and nobody cleans them . Considering other side of pavement closed I wold expect company running this project to be responsible for clearing all the mess they creating around . Any builder they runs building site expected not to litter or spill out in the public street , water company shuld be the same

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Avenue Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped household waste, 10th February
item.description:

item.title: 15 to 20 potholes, 10th February
item.description:
There are 15 to 20 potholes and possibly more which range from small to quite large ones in a 30 to 40 metre section of the road here. It might be worth redoing this section completely but I leave that judgement to you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Merrivale, Southgate, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive pothole in middle of mini roundabout, 10th February
item.description:
This pothole is a deep crater occupying the whole of the middle of the roundabout, making it impossible to avoid. The wear and tear on my car in your Borough is ridiculous , please please get out and fix everything!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bickley Park Road, Bickley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
